headline: The Procter & Gamble Company (PG) Receives Notice of an Unsolicited “Mini-Tender” Offer from Tutanota LLC
summary: With significant hedge fund interest, The Procter & Gamble Company (NYSE:PG) secures a spot on our list of the 15 Best Stocks to Invest in for Financial Stability. On September 2, 2025, The Procter & Gamble Company (NYSE:PG) announced that it received notice of an unsolicited “mini-tender” offer from Tutanota LLC to purchase up to […]

headline: Procter & Gamble restructuring plans: Buyouts, brand sales and a CEO shakeup
summary: Slowing sales create enormous pressure for P&G. In June, the company said it had a plan. Here's what they've disclosed so far and what it means.
